synopsis.text: In the coastal city of G. Kamogawa, Madoka Kyouno, a lively and compassionate student at Kamogawa Girls' High School, is the sole member of the Jersey Club, dedicating her time to assisting others. One day, her life takes an unexpected turn when she rescues an alien named Lan from drowning, leading her to become a pilot of a colossal robot known as Vox. Alongside Lan and another girl named Muginami, Madoka battles extraterrestrial invaders threatening the safety of Kamogawa and Earth. Despite the high stakes, the trio manages to find moments of enjoyment amidst their mecha-piloting adventures.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
